column6: WANT YOU TO WANT ME PART 3 Norman Osborn's plan to ruin the X-Men is coming together, with Deadpool as the unknowing pawn. But Deadpool doesn't like playing someone else's game. Especially when it's the game of death!
column8: | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Paco Medina | penciller:Jason Pearson | letterer:Joe Sabino | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Daniel Way
